column4: hi! I left my computer running when I was away for 2-3 hours, only a terminal and pidgin ran over openbox. After I came back, the terminal's and pidgin's screen-rendering response was very low. when I moved the window, it happened very slowly. however, the mouse cursor rendering was ok. I logged out and in, and everything was OK. what can be the cause?
sounds like the computer went into sleep mode

aeon-ltd : i'm not sure that my comp could actually wake from sleep mode or hibernate as this never worked previously... and it answered me in 2 secs after i moved the mouse. it seemed to be on to me, only blank screen saver...
aeon-ltd : or maybe 1 secs... it's an old P4 @ 2ghz
